pages.text: A $(item)Beacon$() is a block that projects a light beam skyward and can provide status effects such as $(l:brewing/effects#speed)$(thing)Speed$(), $(l:brewing/effects#jump_boost)$(thing)Jump Boost$(), $(l:brewing/effects#haste)$(thing)Haste$(), $(l:brewing/effects#regeneration)$(thing)Regeneration$(), $(l:brewing/effects#resistance)$(thing)Resistance$(), or $(l:brewing/effects#strength)$(thing)Strength$() to nearby $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Players$() when activated with a pyramid.
There are four possible pyramid heights. More levels make more powers available. $(br)Can be built with $(item)Iron/Gold/Emerald/Diamond/Netherite$() blocks.
